summary: This document is an invoice from AT&T Wireless detailing the monthly charges for a wireless account. It includes a summary of previous balances, current charges, and usage details for the billing cycle ending on January 14, 2004. The total amount due is $133.48. This document contains detailed voice usage records for phone calls made from an AT&T Wireless account associated with the Epstein case. It lists numerous incoming and outgoing calls, including timestamps, durations, and locations, primarily focusing on calls made to and from Palm Beach, Florida, and Brentwood, New York. The data may provide insights into communication patterns relevant to the investigation. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for phone numbers associated with Epstein, including call times, durations, and locations. It provides insights into communication patterns and potential connections relevant to the investigation. This document details the voice and data usage for a specific account, including call logs and charges incurred during January 2004. It provides a breakdown of incoming and outgoing calls, their durations, and associated costs, which may be relevant for tracking communications related to the Epstein case.
